```{r setup}
library(PARE)
library(umap)
library(ggplot2)

e <- Rtsne(iris[,-5])
plot(e$layout, col = as.integer(iris$Species), xlab = "UMAP 1", ylab = "UMAP 2")

pe <- pare(iris[,-5], ~ Species, data = iris, umap)
plot(pe$layout, col = as.integer(iris$Species), xlab = "UMAP 1", ylab = "UMAP 2")
```
